\subsubsection[{convert}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}def excerpts.\+main.\+convert (

\item[{}]{magic\+\_\+character, }
\item[{}]{allow\+\_\+pep8 = {\ttfamily True}}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{namespaceexcerpts_1_1main_a5e56ed370605ce9d10cdf0472d44554a}


Convert Lines to Markdown. 

Remove whitespace and magic characters from lines and output valid markdown.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em lines} & The lines to be converted. \\
\hline
{\em comment\+\_\+character} & The comment character of the language. \\
\hline
{\em magic\+\_\+character} & The magic character marking lines as excerpts. \\
\hline
{\em allow\+\_\+pep8} & Allow for a leading comment character and space to confrom to P\+E\+P 8 block comments. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A list of strings containing the lines converted. 
\end{DoxyReturn}

Extract and Convert Matching Lines. 

Just a wrapper to \hyperlink{namespaceexcerpts_1_1main_ac1df68b0d3c715c30d7361d5dea34885}{extract()} and \hyperlink{namespaceexcerpts_1_1main_a5e56ed370605ce9d10cdf0472d44554a}{convert()}.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em lines} & A list containing the code lines. \\
\hline
{\em comment\+\_\+character} & The comment character of the language. \\
\hline
{\em magic\+\_\+character} & The magic character marking lines as excerpts. \\
\hline
{\em allow\+\_\+pep8} & Allow for a leading comment character and space to confrom to P\+E\+P 8 block comments. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A list of strings containing the lines extracted and converted. 
\end{DoxyReturn}

Extract Matching Lines. 

Extract all itmes starting with a combination of comment\+\_\+character and magic\+\_\+character from a list.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em lines} & A list containing the code lines. \\
\hline
{\em comment\+\_\+character} & The comment character of the language. \\
\hline
{\em magic\+\_\+character} & The magic character marking lines as excerpts. \\
\hline
{\em allow\+\_\+pep8} & Allow for a leading comment character and space to confrom to P\+E\+P 8 block comments. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A list of strings containing the lines extracted. 
\end{DoxyReturn}

\subsubsection[{modify\+\_\+path}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}def excerpts.\+main.\+modify\+\_\+path (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}

\item[{}]{postfix = {\ttfamily \char`\"{}\char`\"{}}, }
\item[{}]{prefix = {\ttfamily \char`\"{}\char`\"{}}, }

\item[{}]{extension = {\ttfamily None}}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{namespaceexcerpts_1_1main_a7143bff678d0d683e5ad4a042f2f78b6}


Modify a Path. 

Add a postfix and a prefix to the basename of a path and change it's extension.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em file\+\_\+name} & The file path to be modified. \\
\hline
{\em postfix} & Set the output file postfix. \\
\hline
{\em prefix} & Set the output file prefix. \\
\hline
{\em extension} & Set a new file extension. \\
\hline
{\em output\+\_\+path} & Set a new file name or an output directory. If the path given is not an existing directory, it is assumed to be a file path and all other arguments are discarded. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A string containing the modified path. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
